subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The White Sox would undoubtedly like to trade José Contreras to a contender, but he has done little to make that possible. Contreras, below, has an 8.27 earned run average over his past 11 starts and gave up nine runs in four and two-thirds innings in his last outing. He will stay in the rotation and will make his next start Tuesday, the trading deadline.
